subject: Tennis
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
lead_paragraph: When Rafael Nadal and Roger Federer probed the limits of each other’s resources through delays and fading light at the 2008 Wimbledon final, it was possibly the greatest match ever played.
snippet: When Rafael Nadal and Roger Federer probed the limits of each other’s resources through delays and fading light at the 2008 Wimbledon final, it was possibly the greatest match ever played.
